ProjectTitle: Facilitating the Reverse Triage Selection process in Mass Casualty Incidents and Crowding
InitialFeedbackHistory:
28/06/2022
3. Ethics: Please note that you also need privacy and ethical approval for reuse of UZL patient data; according to the CMT you already have this, please add this information including approval number also to the ethics section in the DMP and submit your updated DMP as intermediate. 
6. Preservation: Please note that onedrive is an external microsoft cloud storage, this data is not stored on the university server, also be aware that onedrive is linked to the users account and expires when the owner leaves, for alternatives see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en or contact your local IT team
7. Sharing: You can now also use KU Leuven RDR for data sharing, if you can't fully anonymize the data you can restrict access and other researchers can request access via the repository: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
